dataTemplate.name: XXHVOPERRDTL
dataTemplate.description: OD HVOP Detail Error Report by Order Number

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT to_char(CREATION_DATE,'MON-DD-YYYY') PROCESS_DATE ,''''|| ORDER_NUMBER || SUB_ORDER_NUMBER ORDER_REFERENCE_NUMBER ,ORDERTOTAL ORDER_TOTAL ,TOTALTAX TAX_VALUE ,ERROR_DESCRIPTION MESSAGE_TEXT FROM apps.XXOM_IMPORT_INT WHERE Process_Flag = 'E' AND Status = 'Error' AND trunc(CREATION_DATE) BETWEEN trunc(:P_PROCESS_START_DATE) AND trunc(:P_PROCESS_END_DATE)
